title: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa - Wikipedia
snippet: On 1 December 2025, Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa was admitted to University Hospital of São João, in Porto, for urgent surgery due to an incarcerated hernia, after feeling unwell.

title: Portuguese President Rebelo de Sousa hospitalised following emergency surgery | Euronews
snippet: The Portuguese head of state was admitted to hospital late on Monday afternoon "after feeling unwell following digestive issues," but is said to be recovering following an emergency hernia operation.

title: Rebelo de Sousa cancels state visit to Spain, scheduled for next week, due to health problems
snippet: The 76-year-old president underwent emergency surgery at a hospital in Porto on Monday, December 1, after experiencing digestive discomfort upon returning from a trip.
